name: MYOSOTIS
description:
Complete the puzzles in the interactable cut scene to unravel the story between two children who built a dreamland together.

Myosotis is a chapter for a bigger project I am working on, It is a work in progress. Stay tuned for more.

Basic Controls: 

- Arrow keys to move

-Space to go next

-ESC to exit game.

ENJOY!
